short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new words with each tab you open!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an epic language-learning journey every time you open a new tab in your web browser! 

Every tab you open presents a new opportunity to sharpen your vocabulary and expand your verbal abilities with this Chrome extension. Your hero will be faced with a SAT vocabulary definition and must choose the right word from the multiple options. Choose the right word to succeed, or face the consequences if you fail...
